library_map.name: Library Map
library_map.description: A hand-drawn map with moisture warnings.

common_lichen1.name: Mossy Lichen
common_lichen1.description: A green lichen that grows in masses that resemble moss but are much more rugged. Plentiful in most ecosystems.

common_lichen2.name: Green Scale Lichen
common_lichen2.description: A green lichen that forms scaled layers. Looks nice in a terrarium.

common_lichen3.name: Common Gray Lichen
common_lichen3.description: A grayish-green lichen that grows in small patches on tree trunks. Commonly used in beginner studies.

common_lichen4.name: Common Yellow Lichen
common_lichen4.description: A bright yellow lichen found on tree bark and rocks. Useful for basic lichenology studies.

rare_lichen1.name: Rare Magenta Lichen
rare_lichen1.description: An uncommon purple-tinged lichen with potential scientific interest. Hard to find in the wild.

rare_lichen2.name: Ghost Candle Lichen
rare_lichen2.description: A pakle grey lichen with fluorescent magenta fruiting bodies, often found in unique microenvironments. Valuable for research.

rare_lichen3.name: Giant Faeirie Cup Lichen
rare_lichen3.description: A pakle cyan lichen in the shape of tall cups, may form a symbiotic relationship with certain trees. New research indicates potential biochemical applications.

lichenology_book.name: Introduction to Lichenology
lichenology_book.description: A textbook covering the basics of lichen classification, ecology, and research methods.

energy_drink.name: Energy Drink
energy_drink.description: Restores your energy level. Tastes like science.

research_notes.name: Lichen Research Notes
research_notes.description: Your compiled notes on lichen specimens and their properties. Valuable for further research.

microscope_slide.name: Prepared Lichen Slide
microscope_slide.description: A microscope slide with a prepared lichen sample, ready for detailed study.

lichen_spores.name: Lichen Spores
lichen_spores.description: Reproductive spores from various lichen species. Useful for cultivation experiments.

student_id.name: Student ID Card
student_id.description: Your university identification card. Grants access to campus facilities.

lucky_charm.name: Lucky Charm
lucky_charm.description: A small trinket that brings you comfort during exams.

focus_tea.name: Focus Tea
focus_tea.description: A herbal tea blend that improves concentration.
